clusterName.description: the name of the cluster in GKE.  Oftentimes the same as the `slug`, but sometimes post-fixed with a number

credentials.description: the project-level service account email used to perform various operations in GCS

zones.description: the list of GCS zones where the cluster's nodes will be located

masterEndpoint.description: the IP address of the main Kubernetes endpoint

tokens.description: properties used to tokenize the McGonagall specification

masterIP.description: the IP address of the main Kubernetes endpoint

dashboardAdmin.description: the username for the dashboards internal to the cluster

dashboardPass.description: the password for the dashboards internal to the cluster

awsAccount.description: the AWS access key ID for use with AWS operaions

awsSecret.description: the AWS secret access key for use with AWS operaions

serviceAccounts.description: `key: email` pairs that will be used to replace values throughout the document

channels.description: channels that this cluster is a member of.  e.g. environments, deployment groups

environment.description: the broad environment where this cluster lives

slug.description: the human-readable identfier for this cluster

subdomain.description: the subdomain of the cluster.  Could be distinct from the slug, but usually the same

url.description: the full hostname for the cluster, the conjunction of `subdomain`.`domain`

projectId.description: the human-readable slug for the cluster's project in GCS

username.description: the username for basic auth for the cluster's Kubernetes API

password.description: the password for basic auth for the cluster's Kubernetes API
